channel.title: AARscape - AARisAIR
channel.description:
[center][b][u][size=6]AARScape[/size][/u][/b]
[font=Verdana][size=2]one of the first and most popular pking 317 private servers, where it was known for its combo of torags hammers, dragon chain, black helm, pring, and was originally created by Hemi/AArisAir. After the server went down, there were a few attempts to bring it back but alas were unsuccessful until now! We are proud to say that AARScape is back for a 2016 version! Where we have taken fragments from the old server and adding new features![/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=6][u][url=http://www.aarscape.com/client/Launcher.jar]Client[/url][/u] [u][url=http://www.aarscape.com]website[/url][/u][/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][b][u][size=5]Features![/size][/u][/b][/font] [font=Verdana][b][u][/u][/b][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]Multi world Pking (Pking outside of the wilderness can be turned on and off)[/size][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]All skills working![/size][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]Near perfect combat system[/size][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]Near perfect clipping attacks/walking[/size][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]Near perfect dragon attacks[/size][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]Slayer Assignments based on level[/size][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]Switch between Ancient, modern, and lunar spells[/size][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]Switch between modern and ancient prayer book[/size][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]Nomad hunting[/size][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]Barrows (There but being changed up)[/size][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]Basic sound system[/size][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]Great economy[/size][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]Tele and bank access on mini map[/size][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]Starter quest for beginner gear![/size][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]Very much more there and being added.[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]Bosses[/size][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]Jad (single wave and individual jad person[/size][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]King black dragon[/size][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]Dagganoth kings[/size][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]Jungle demons[/size][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]Nomad[/size][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]Dad (Troll)[/size][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]God Wars[/size][/font] [font=verdana, arial, helvetica, sans-serif][size=2]Corporeal[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=2] Beast (In progress)[/size][/font] [font=Verdana][size=2]More bosses added almost daily![/size][/font]
Just to clarify, because someone logged in and wanted to argue with me about it. This is a 317 loading 614 data. It is a 317. Just because it has a higher revisions items does not make the client that revision.
[/center]
[left]GALLERY[/left] [spoiler] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/13398513/imgs/img1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/13398513/imgs/img2.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/13398513/imgs/img3.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/13398513/imgs/img4.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/13398513/imgs/img5.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/13398513/imgs/img6.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/13398513/imgs/img7.png[/img][/spoiler]

item.title: AARscape - AARisAIR
item.dc:creator: @portugalrox portugalrox
item.description:
@portugalrox wrote:

New content daily!

  • XP rates revamped
  • New pickpocketing from NPC’s
  • Working Sigils - Spirit shields!
  • Currently a new custom minigame being added!

Current and Active staff, Possibly more positions to come!

Read full topic

item.title: AARscape - AARisAIR
item.dc:creator: @alex4ever alex4ever
item.description:
@alex4ever wrote:

Lots of updates have been done! The dedication from the staff and the members and mods is great would love to see this server grow more!

Read full topic

item.title: AARscape - AARisAIR
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

Xp rate has be raised. We are revamping all of the skills. Will be adding quests soon as well. Hope you guys enjoy our dedication

Read full topic

item.title: AARscape - AARisAIR
item.dc:creator: @sniffle6 sniffle6
item.description:
@sniffle6 wrote:

I appreciate the love. The server has lots of new features since the original post. Including starter packages for different play styles!

Read full topic

item.title: AARscape - AARisAIR
item.dc:creator: @portugalrox portugalrox
item.description:
@portugalrox wrote:

Hey everyone I tried this server out it’s pretty fun and constant updates! Very active admin and owners! Come join.

Read full topic

item.title: AARscape - AARisAIR
item.dc:creator: @alex4ever alex4ever
item.description:
@alex4ever wrote:

Its a very fun server! Very smooth and has a lot of cool features. Always being updated, every time I get on, there is an update or multiple that has been done!

The staff listen to the community as well and the dev almost always responds.

Read full topic

item.description:
@sniffle6 wrote:

Low xp rate? Interesting i get 99 in about an hour

Xp rates have been adjusted to appease the newer players

item.title: AARscape - AARisAIR
item.dc:creator: @sniffle6 sniffle6
item.description:
@sniffle6 wrote:

[center][size=6]AARScape[/size]

[font=Verdana][size=2]one of the first and most popular pking 317 private servers, where it was known for its combo of torags hammers, dragon chain, black helm, pring, and was originally created by Hemi/AArisAir. After the server went down, there were a few attempts to bring it back but alas were unsuccessful until now! We are proud to say that AARScape is back for a 2016 version! Where we have taken fragments from the old server and adding new features![/size][/font]

[font=Verdana][size=6]Client website[/size][/font]

[font=Verdana][size=5]Features![/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]Multi world Pking (Pking outside of the wilderness can be turned on and off)[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]All skills working![/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]Near perfect combat system[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]Near perfect clipping attacks/walking[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]Near perfect dragon attacks[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]Slayer Assignments based on level[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]Switch between Ancient, modern, and lunar spells[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]Switch between modern and ancient prayer book[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]Nomad hunting[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]Barrows (There but being changed up)[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]Basic sound system[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]Great economy[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]Tele and bank access on mini map[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]Starter quest for beginner gear![/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]Very much more there and being added.[/size][/font]

[font=Verdana][size=2]Bosses[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]Jad (single wave and individual jad person[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]King black dragon[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]Dagganoth kings[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]Jungle demons[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]Nomad[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]Dad (Troll)[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]God Wars[/size][/font]
[font=verdana, arial, helvetica, sans-serif][size=2]Corporeal[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=2] Beast (In progress)[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2]More bosses added almost daily![/size][/font]

Just to clarify, because someone logged in and wanted to argue with me about it.
This is a 317 loading 614 data. It is a 317. Just because it has a higher revisions items does not make the client that revision.

[/center]

[left]GALLERY[/left]
[spoiler]






[/spoiler]
